messages.title: General Election - 12 December 2019
messages.content: Join the campaign to re-elect Iain Duncan Smith.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Securing additional funding for the schools of constituents with £400 million for Whipps Cross, getting extra funding for our schools and colleges, and delivering an extra £33.3 billion for the NHS in the next Parliament.
Supporting Prime Minister, Boris Johnson in being committed to honour our original commitment to respect the 2016 referendum result, to leave the European Union.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Chingford & Woodford Green is a marginal seat.

issues.brexitEurope: Support the Conservatives in this election.

leaflet.personalStatement: For the last 27 years, I have always put the needs of my constituents first.
leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet calls for support and volunteer participation in the campaign.
